text:
Ashutosh Kumar, one of the five JNU students who resurfaced at the campus Sunday night and is wanted by the police in a sedition case, joined the investigation on Saturday.

Kumar produced himself at R.K. Puram Police Station where Umar Khalid and Anirban Bhattacharya are being interrogated, a police official said. Kumar received a police summons on Friday night. The other two students — Rama Naga and Anant Kumar — are yet to receive the summons. They had written to the police that they are ready to join the investigation too. — PTI
title: Ashutosh returns to campus, 2 yet to get summons
